articles.title: Yashasvi Jaiswal becomes highest-ranked Indian T20I batter after Suryakumar Yadav, Shubman Gill jumps 36 places - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Yashasvi Jaiswal is now the highest-ranked Indian batter in ICC T20I rankings behind Suryakumar Yadav. | Crickit
articles.content: Young Indian batters Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal made rapid gains in India's T20I rankings after successful outings in the recently concluded series against Zimbabwe. In their first series afte… [+1965 chars]

articles.content: We've all been told, at some point or the other, that our skin problems exist because we're just not drinking enough water. The human body consists of around 70 per cent water and we lose up to two a… [+2167 chars]
